Bash(git filter-branch --msg-filter '
  sed ""/ðŸ¤– Generated with \[Claude Code\]/d"" | 
  sed ""/Co-Authored-By: Claude/d"" |
  sed -e :a -e ""/^\n*$/{$d;N;ba"" -e ""}""
' --force -- --all)

Bash(echo " 50. **Task - UI typography and statistics enhancements**: Improved font sizing system and statistics modal features
**Result**: Updated all UI fonts to use JupyterLab-driven CSS variables for consistent scaling - column names use calc(var(--jp-ui-font-size1) * 1.10) for 10% larger text, column types use var(--jp-ui-font-size1), table cells and row numbers use var(--jp-ui-font-size1). Added settings icon to JupyterLab Settings panel using ui-components:spreadsheet. Restored Font Awesome info icon (fas fa-info-circle) for column statistics. Added maxUniqueValues setting (default: 100) controlling unique value display limits in both filter dialog and statistics modal. Enhanced statistics modal with scrollable unique values list sorted by frequency (most common first) showing value counts and percentages. Changed unique values display from custom box layout to standard bullet points matching other stats sections. Info message only shows when values are limited (""Showing X of Y unique values""), hidden when all values displayed. Backend now accepts limit parameter from frontend and sorts values by frequency descending. All fonts now responsive to JupyterLab''s UI font size settings. Version 1.3.29")
